comments:
This probably has something to do with SWT and Mozilla...

Or could it be that I am using Eclipse 3.0.1 (not 3.1!) and that the plugin in
fact only supports 3.1. I noticed that it said "Bugzilla Plugin for Eclipse
3.1", but I thought it was worth a try.

If this is the reason why is it that 3.0.1 is not support when this is the
latest stable release?

It will only work with > 3.1 M3. We have no plans to back port this.
